speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah calling from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with John Smith?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is John. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your outstanding balance with Green Finance. Before we proceed, can you please verify your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming. Can you also provide your date of birth for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I appreciate your cooperation. You now have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to settle this?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half of it today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. Would you like to make the first payment of $125 over the phone or online?

speaker: Customer
text: I prefer to do it online. Can you send me the link?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely. I will send you an email with the payment link right after this call. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that's all. Thank you for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, John! Thank you for your time today. Have a great day!
